name: Beer Strip
description:
If you're a bit older, you know what's this about, if not, then give it a try. It's FREE!

It's a game you can beat by improving your skills.

  • Choose one of the four Milfvania girls
  • Catch all the beer bottles while she strips
  • If you drop more than 3 bottles it's GAME OVER.


  • Fully animated poses and actions
  • Bonus image gallery for each girl

More girls will be gradually added in future updates.
